column1: alien coin necklace catching streetlamp glow
chrome bubble helmet clutched like a disco prop
chrome drones circling like disco balls
cracked visor carried like an ironic handbag
crystal pendant glowing faintly under club strobes
holstered blaster glittering under neon haze
jetpack straps worn like fetish harness
pistol strapped over sequins, absurd and alluring
rayblade swinging at her hip while she dances
